name: Luv Infiniti
description:
An interactive EP for windows 10 ~ note: this is a game that isn't really a game, it can be explored and searched for surprises, maybe you can even catapult yourself out of the fish tank and be an outside observer. Or you can sit back and watch the music videos as this world passes by.  

Use keys WASD to move, Spacebar to jump, Enter key to skip to the next song

the songs are included in the downloadable zip file // 

20 mins gameplay that is re-playable !

I wrote these songs in late 2019 and early 2020 alone at my kitchen table, I wanted to express the feeling of breaking through a long period of loneliness and isolation, little did I know we would all be embarking on this journey alone/together.. I hope it uplifts you and that you dance in your bedrooms or blast it in your car.

// songs for the revolution, luv ya babes xoxo // 

thank you to Mystery Room Mastering for the mastering (https://www.mysteryroommastering.com/)

and Samer Ghani for the photography 
(https://www.samerghani.com/)

hear the music at: www.luximusic.bandcamp.com  // see my other work at www.wickedalley.com 

All proceeds to be donated to Love on Black Women:: www.loveonblackwomen.com
